crushingboots.name: crushingboots
lore: The gods of Prison have uniquely imbued these boots
These boots provide unique bonuses to DrillHammer blessings
as well as regularly crushing blocks below the player.

shockwaveburst.name: shockwaveburst
lore: The gods of Prison have uniquely imbued this Chestplate
It provides added bonuses to explosive passives,
as well as causing a regular shockwave while mining.

trinket.name: trinket
lore: The gods of Prison have uniquely imbued this pickaxe
Helmet enchant increases the likelihood of receiving
scratchers, keys, tokens, sponges, beacons, and dragon eggs
any time while mining.
This helmet also augments many blessings to be more potent

kickdown.name: kickdown
lore: The gods of Prison have uniquely imbued these leggings
These are incredibly powerful and empower many blessings
as well as reducing all shop token costs by themselves

baddaboom.name: baddaboom
lore: The gods of Prison have uniquely imbued this pickaxe
Augments and improves all explosive based blessings
This pickaxe when enchanted with explosives enchants
provides the largest and most potent explosions.
Truly a tool of the gods.

megadrill.name: megadrill
lore: The gods of Prison have uniquely imbued this pickaxe
Improves and empowers all DrillHammer based passives.
When paired with DrillHammer enchant, it becomes much more potent
Truly a tool of the gods.

antiflee.name: antiflee
lore: The gods of Prison have uniquely imbued this sword
10% chance to pull a target enemy toward you.

mobdestroyer.name: mobdestroyer
lore: The gods of Prison have uniquely imbued this sword
10% chance to deal 8x damage to a mob or boss.

prisonassault.name: prisonassault
lore: The gods of Prison have uniquely imbued this sword
12% chance to deal double damage to a player
